title: 1.9自定义烟花指令的问题
author: 邪恶草
txt_content:
求问：1.9的这段生成自定义烟花的指令执行后，刷出的烟花并不能产生爆炸，请问是怎么回事？

summon FireworksRocketEntity ~ ~1 ~ {LifeTime:1,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:  {Explosions:[{Flicker:10,Trail:1,Type:3,Colors:[0],FadeColors:[0]},  {Flicker:10,Trail:0,Type:1,Colors:[16777215],FadeColors:[16777215]}]}}}}

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
summon FireworksRocketEntity ~ ~1 ~ {LifeTime:1,FireworksItem:{id:minecraft:fireworks,Count:1,tag:{Fireworks:{Explosions:[{Flicker:10,Trail:1,Type:3,Colors:[0],FadeColors:[0]},{Flicker:10,Trail:0,Type:1,Colors:[16777215],FadeColors:[16777215]}]}}}}
老规矩了，要把数字ID改成英文ID

replies.author: Deing
邪恶草
replies.txt_content:
Deing 发表于 2016-11-19 09:44
试试这个
summon FireworksRocketEntity ~ ~1 ~ {LifeTime:1,FireworksItem:{id:401,Count:1b,tag:{Firewor ...
没有执行失败。是生成了烟花，但是无法爆炸而已
